detail_desc: Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable elastic braces, zip fly and press-stud, wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined.
Sleeveless dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back, a glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Lace-trimmed jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck front and back, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Jacket in a marled cotton knit with a lined hood, zip down the front with a leather tab, side pockets, and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with a flounced trim, press-studs at the back, a narrow elastic seam and sewn-on bow at the waist, and straight legs.

Blouse in a crisp weave. Open section at the back with ties at the back of the neck and middle of the back. Half-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a peplum.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and zipped vents in the sides.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a soft shaft and zip at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 4.5 cm.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high cut at the back and high-cut legs.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, ribbed jersey with button-front shoulder straps, a small chest pocket and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the romper suit is organic.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Baby Exclusive. Hairband in soft organic cotton jersey with a knot detail at the front and elastication at the back.

prod_name: Rachel or Merry HW Denim TRS
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Calf-length lace dress with adjustable spaghetti straps, a V-neck and concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with pleats and a flared skirt. Lined in contrasting colour jersey.
Metal earrings decorated with plastic and glass beads. Size approx. 3x3 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.
Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist and a zip fly with a button. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sandals with straps at the front and elastic heel straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short-sleeved shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long, V-neck dress in glittery jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Low-cut back, a seam at the waist and a fitted skirt that flares at the hem. Jersey lining.
Oversized tunic in an airy cotton weave with a small frilled collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and wide flounces at the hem.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace-covered shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Swim pants with a laser-cut frilled trim at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Lined gusset.
Top in soft, block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length skirt in a viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave containing some linen. High paper bag waist with a small frill trim, covered elastication and detachable tie belt. Pleats front and back for added width, and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket, slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a super-high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with buttons down the back, a seam at the waist with a detachable bow at the back and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a glittery pattern. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hair set with two hair elastics and two hair clips decorated with butterflies. Length of hair clips 5 cm.
Non-padded bra in microfibre with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and a reflective detail.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small stand-up collar, a V-neck, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lining dress with narrow shoulder straps.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the top. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. V-neck inner top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.

Jacket in a sturdy pima cotton weave with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Nightshirt in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Set in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a round neck and long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs. Opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hem with a tie detail.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Pile lining.
Lightly padded jacket in nylon with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a sturdy cotton weave with pleats at the top and a detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Handbag in quilted imitation leather with two metal chain and imitation leather handles and a magnetic fastening at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 12x23x28 cm.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket and front and back pockets. Seam at the waist, buttons at the sides and tapered legs with raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Hat in a marled linen and cotton blend with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 3 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Joggers in marled sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams in a contrasting colour and an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, slightly lower crotch, front pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, tapered legs with decorative seams and quilted sections.
Soft pile fancy dress hat in the shape of a unicorn with padding, embroidery, sewn-on ears and a sewn-on horn. Hook and loop fastener at the front. Lined. Polyester padding.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft, double-layered fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens (size 0-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and stripes down the sides.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured, striped cotton and viscose weave. Notch lapels, patch front pockets and buttons at the front. Lined.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fleece-lined rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams and reflective details. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short, voluminous dress in woven fabric with embroidery on the front and a round neckline with a V-neck opening and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Elbow-length, raglan balloon sleeves with covered elastication, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
